posts.content:
Having to sell my trailer as I don't have the space for it any more. :'(
Perfect for lugging extra camping gear etc. Easy resto to match your bus or ready-to-roll rat.
It's on eBay - http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/322319204134?ssPageName=STRK:MESELX:IT&_trksid=p3984.m1555.l2649
1 day left on the auction, 99p start. No reserve. Grab a bargain!
